message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. It's a good start, and I'm sure we can work something out if you accept.
Let's be more realistic. I'll take 60%, you take 40%. This is a fair compromise and avoids further negotiation.
I'm willing to meet you halfway.  Let's split the money 55/45.  We both get a decent share, and it avoids the risk of losing even more with further rounds.
